title: How to Make a Homemade Spinach Dip

steps.headline: Take the spinach from the 2 cans of cooked spinach.
steps.description: Cut them into small rectangle pieces.

steps.headline: Have one cup of sour cream with you.
Have one can of veggie soup mix with you.
Take one small onion and cut it into medium sized pieces.
Have one can of water chestnuts with you.
steps.description: Cut each water chestnut into four pieces.

steps.headline: Take everything and mix it together.
Put the dip into a bowl.
Enjoy!
steps.description: Dip anything you like in it.

text: Take the spinach from the 2 cans of cooked spinach. Cut them into small rectangle pieces. Have one cup of sour cream with you.  Have one can of veggie soup mix with you.  Take one small onion and cut it into medium sized pieces.  Have one can of water chestnuts with you. Cut each water chestnut into four pieces. Take everything and mix it together.  Put the dip into a bowl.  Enjoy! Dip anything you like in it.
